Program allows creation of an outstanding invoices list of a selected client
Alpha for submitable subroutine
Parameters passed as Alpha to allow easy conversion to submitted job
Note FILEDLG function only allows selection of a file not of path as such
so we remove the selected file form the path
This trick does not work if the path is empty!!!
If no to admno/clnt use from

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OSP008]: Generate file with outstanding invoices')
